entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
